message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value for us both. This product is not just an item; it's a testament to innovation and craftsmanship that I believe will enrich your life significantly. Given its intrinsic worth and the benefits it offers, I propose a transaction price of $950,000. This offer reflects a fair compromise between the product's value and my desire to ensure a mutually beneficial outcome. I trust this proposal will be favorable to you and look forward to discussing how we can proceed together.
